entry.name: switchClass
entry.title: .switchClass()
entry.desc: Adds and removes the specified class(es) to each of the set of matched elements while animating all style changes.

longdesc.p: The .switchClass() method allows you to animate the transition of adding and removing classes at the same time.

argument.name: removeClassName
argument.desc: One or more class names (space separated) to be removed from the class attribute of each matched element.

argument.name: addClassName
argument.desc: One or more class names (space separated) to be added to the class attribute of each matched element.

example.desc: Adds the class "blue" and removes the class "big" from the matched elements.
